Acute injury? Get fast help.

We've made it easy for both you and your healthcare provider to submit a referral digitally – you'll often get an appointment within 24 hours.

How to seek urgent care with us – no matter where you live

The easiest way to get urgent care with us is to have a healthcare provider send a referral directly to us.

We are connected to the National Patient Overview (NPÖ), which gives us access to your digital medical records. Additionally, we have connections to radiology systems throughout Sweden and can, with your consent, quickly retrieve your digital X-rays, regardless of region.

Ask your healthcare provider to refer you:

  • Your doctor at an urgent care clinic or health center
  • Digital healthcare provider (e.g., Kry)
  • Your physiotherapist
  • Your naprapath or chiropractor
  • Registered Nurse

Have you received a paper referral?

Instead of waiting for processing in your home region, you can photograph and submit the referral directly to our medical records system. Use the digital referral upload in the section below.

Important information about X-rays

We prefer that your injured shoulder, elbow or knee is X-rayed before your visit, but it is not an absolute requirement.

Digital Referral Upload: Two Ways In

Whether you're a patient or healthcare provider, on desktop or mobile, here are the ways to upload your referral:

Upload from Desktop (PC/Mac)

The easiest method for healthcare providers at a clinic.

  1. Copy the password
  2. Click on referral upload.
  3. Authenticate with BankID.
  4. Upload referral (PDF, image file or media).

Why only these file types?

To protect your patient data, we only accept files such as PDF, images, photos (JPG, PNG) and video (MP4). These formats cannot contain malicious code, ensuring secure transfer and GDPR compliance.

Files with editable text (e.g., from word processors) are not accepted.

Password

2026nyår

Double-click to select → Copy (Ctrl+C) → Click "Start Referral Upload"

Start Referral Upload

Upload from Mobile (Patient & Provider on the go)

Perfect for patients with paper referrals or healthcare providers away from the office (e.g., on the ski slope, in the countryside).

  1. Copy the password
  2. Click on referral upload
  3. Log in with BankID.
  4. Upload your file. You can either:
    • Photograph your paper referral directly.
    • Upload a screenshot or existing file.

IMPORTANT (for healthcare providers):

If you're sending a screenshot of a note, make sure it includes:

  • Patient's personal identity number
  • Patient's mobile number
  • Your name and title

Password

2026nyår

Double-click to select → Copy (Ctrl+C) → Paste on Storegate page

Start Referral Upload

What happens after your upload?

  1. 1

    Nurse reviews Morning

    A nurse checks your referral and verifies that all details (personal ID number, name, mobile number) are correct. This usually happens in the morning (weekdays).

  2. 2

    Specialist evaluates Afternoon

    An orthopedic specialist medically evaluates your injury.

  3. You receive a booking SMS

    Once your referral is approved, you'll receive an SMS with a link to book your appointment.

  4. IMPORTANT: Complete the questionnaire

    After booking your appointment, you will be directed to a digital questionnaire about your injury and health. It is essential that you complete this so we can prepare for your visit.

Need an appointment extra quickly?

Some acute injuries are time-critical. If you or your healthcare provider determine that you need to be seen immediately, call us directly after uploading your referral. We often have the ability to schedule extra appointments after 4:00 PM for these cases.

Need Expert Assessment?

Book a consultation with Dr. Carlos Rivero Siri for shoulder nerve pain.
